question: Which prominent figure from Madhya Pradesh founded ‘Bachpan Bachao Andolan’ in 1980?
explanation: Kailash Satyarthi is Indian children’s rights and education advocate and an activist against child labour. He founded the Bachpan Bachao Andolan (Save the Childhood Movement) in 1980. His work is recognized through various national and international honours and awards including the Nobel Peace Prize of 2014, which he shared with Malala Yousafzai.
